description:
Riki`s morning begins with the feeling that he had forgotten something in his dream. As he continues through the day in a daze, a certain girl confesses that she likes him. When Kyousuke hears the news, he tells Riki that Rin also received a confession, from a third year student. This comes as a shock to Riki for reasons he can`t understand. Later, while talking with Rin, he suddenly becomes strangely conscious of her. When he works up the nerve to ask her about the guy who confessed to her, Rin makes a suggestion he never expected...
Source: crunchyroll
